name: NYDailyNews
text:
The House approved a $1.5 trillion plan to fund transit projects. The bill also pumps billions into fixing roads, bridges and affordable housing. 

Republicans objected that the bill was really the Green New Deal in disguise.

https://t.co/XPvxk0eJMh

name: NYDailyNews
text:
San Francisco police will no longer release most mug shots to the public, due to fears that they undermine the presumption of innocence and contribute to racial stereotypes.

https://t.co/0pdMxb91Ut

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @snydenydn: Virgil Abloh’s initial rendition of Pop Smoke’s posthumous album cover was so bad, he took it off Instagram. 

Now, 50 Cent — who is in charge of Smoke’s album “Shoot for the Stars, Aim for the Moon” — is taking to the streets.

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The grieving mother of a man shot dead in Brooklyn said her son was shielding a female friend when the bullets started flying, killing them both.

Cops are searching for suspect Charles Hernandez, who allegedly killed his victims with an assault rifle.
